channel.title: Moparscape server help!
channel.description:
Hello, uhm i got a few questions...
i have created my own server (Dutchserver) and when i open: ''runserver'' then it says:
Exception in thread ''main'' java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
and when i open: ''compiler'' then you see this:
c - Compile your server. r - To run your server. e - To exit out of the program. jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive. color - Change the Text nd Background colors of this compiler. reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
Option:
When i typ ''c'' by option and pressing enter... then its sayin:
You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates. Go to Mod Tahorak's tutorial on the Moperscape Tuturorials section. For step-by-step instruction to download the newest JDK update.
where can i get JDK 5.0 or 6.0, and how to install? and where is the Mod Tagorak's tutorial on moparscape forum?

item.title: Moparscape server help!
item.dc:creator: @pk_idiot4 pk idiot4
item.description:
@pk_idiot4 wrote:

[quote=“run, post:2, topic:88464”]go here,
https://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

for java jdk and you already have the perfect compiler[/quote]

Ty for helping me!
but uhm, wich JDK i need to download?

there are many JDK 6.0 there

JDK 6.0 Se
JDK 6.0 EE
JDK 6.0u1

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape server help!

item.description:

go here,

item.title: Moparscape server help!
item.dc:creator: @pk_idiot4 pk idiot4
item.description:
@pk_idiot4 wrote:

Hello,
uhm i got a few questions…

i have created my own server (Dutchserver)
and when i open: ‘‘runserver’’
then it says:

Exception in thread ‘‘main’’ java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server

and when i open: ‘‘compiler’’
then you see this:

c - Compile your server.
r - To run your server.
e - To exit out of the program.
jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive.
color - Change the Text nd Background colors of this compiler.
reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.

Option:

When i typ ‘‘c’’ by option and pressing enter…
then its sayin:

You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates.
Go to Mod Tahorak’s tutorial on the Moperscape Tuturorials section.
For step-by-step instruction to download the newest JDK update.

where can i get JDK 5.0 or 6.0, and how to install?
and where is the Mod Tagorak’s tutorial on moparscape forum?

Read full topic
